attributes.action: Introduce Sign Language as a compulsory subject in school
attributes.additional_details: I worked in retail for 2 years and we would get a lot of deaf customers and noone would be able to communicate I found this very unfair. Moving forward face masks will be a compulsory item to wear which will make it harder for those who lip read
attributes.background: Introduce Sign Language as a compulsory subject in school so that all are inculeded. Especially if face masks will be a compulsory item moving forward
